author: jim
msg: Merge r1572896, r1572911, r1603156 from trunk:
Don't fail when asked to flush inflated data to the user-agent and that
coincides with the end of stream ("Zlib error flushing inflate buffer").
Be safe from successive or post end-of-stream flush buckets.

author: cmccabe
msg: HADOOP-10591. Compression codecs must used pooled direct buffers or deallocate direct buffers when stream is closed (cmccabe)

author: jim
msg: mod_deflate: The DEFLATE input filter (inflates request bodies) now
limits the length and compression ratio of inflated request bodies to avoid
denial of sevice via highly compressed bodies.  See directives
Thanks to Giancarlo Pellegrino and Davide Balzarotti for reporting the issue.
